data.title: Brookfield Place: Best NYC Destination for Shopping & Dining
data.meta_description: Welcome to Brookfield Place New York, NYC's best destination for shopping, dining, cultural events and art exhibits in downtown Manhattan.
data.text:
Follow the Art Walk that will help guide you through the permanent and temporary installations on view at Brookfield Place.

Volley serve and swing your way into the 9th annual Brookfield Place Open!

Follow the Art Walk that will help guide you through the permanent and temporary installations on view at Brookfield Place.

Volley serve and swing your way into the 9th annual Brookfield Place Open!

Discover artwork that merges the vibrancy of the natural world with the complexity of the digital through woven tapestries inspired by the Amazon rainforest and modern computational methods.

Volley serve and swing your way into the 9th annual Brookfield Place Open!

In celebration of the arrival of the new palm trees, Brookfield Place will present site-specific public programming in the form of a restorative sound bath experience.

Discover artwork that merges the vibrancy of the natural world with the complexity of the digital through woven tapestries inspired by the Amazon rainforest and modern computational methods.

Volley serve and swing your way into the 9th annual Brookfield Place Open!
